subject: New Box Coming
author: ecuyler
full_text:
I just read on the Paranormal Systems website that they are developing
a new box called the MaxiBox.  It has a lot of features I've heard
Bruce mention that would be beneficial to the boxes.  

Hell, I've been trying my best to locate an older 12-470 to modify so
I could start doing the research.  I know there is the 12-469, but
I've been hesitant because of all the talk about the annoying click. 

Jeremy
